notes: KPWr (Polish Corpus of Wrocław University of Technology, pl. Korpus Języka Polskiego Politechniki Wrocławskiej) is a corpus of written and spoken documents available on the Creative Common license. The texts are divided into 14 categories (blogs, science, stenographic recordings, etc.). The documents are annotated on the level of chunks and selected predicate-argument relations, named entities, relations between named entities, anaphora relations and word senses.
title: Polish Corpus of Wrocław University of Technology 1.1
